com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce
Class BaseTraversalManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.BaseTraversalManager

public class BaseTraversalManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing the Traversalmanager that gets registered with the connector manager.

This class gets called every second or so by the connector-manager requesting a traversal()

setBatchHint

public void setBatchHint(int hint)
The connectormanager sets the batch limit (num of docs to return to it).. this param is ignored by the salesforce connector

startTraversal

public DocumentList startTraversal()

resumeTraversal

public DocumentList resumeTraversal(java.lang.String checkpoint)
The sets the batch limit (num of docs to return to it)..

the checkpoint entered into this method is the numeric checkpoint used by the connector/connectormanager and not the same setting as the LAST_SYNC_DATE used by the quartz scheduler.

Parameters:
checkpoint - the checkpoint file the traversal manager should resume from
Returns:
DocumentList to return back to the connector-manager

getConnector

public BaseConnector getConnector()
